name: Hack N' Shoot
description:
WARNING: IT IS RECOMMENDED THAT YOU INSTALL THE GAME TO PLAY IT. IT IS VERY LAGGY IN THE BROWSER.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49 with the theme of "Unstable."

This game fits with the theme because you can hack in the game which makes it "Unstable."

Hack N' Shoot is a top down shooter where you can choose different hacks. The hacks are: speed, instant shooting, big bullet, slow enemy, aimbot, and invincibility.  The hacks add more things to the game.
